mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cnr(cnr_no, c_code, id, cnr_regdate, cnr_content, cn_no) values (seq_cnrno.nextval, #{c_code}, #{id}, sysdate, #{cnr_content},#{cn_no})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,tbl_cnr.* from tbl_cnr where cn_no=#{cn_no} order by cnr_no) where rn between (#{cri.pageStart}+1) and (#{cri.pageStart}+#{cri.perPageNum})
select count(*) from tbl_cnr where cn_no=#{cn_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cnr where id = #{id} and c_code = #{c_code}
